    • Method Detail

      • isPlaylist

        public boolean isPlaylist()
        Description copied from interface: AudioWrapper
        Determines whether or not the loaded tracks are the contents of a playlist or simply a search result.

        Note: This WILL RETURN FALSE ALL THE TIME if the used AudioNode is running Lavalink Server v2 (NOT v3).

        Specified by:
        isPlaylist in interface AudioWrapper
        Returns:
        Whether the result was from a playlist or a search.

      • getSelectedTrack

        @Nullable
public TrackDataPair getSelectedTrack()
        Description copied from interface: AudioWrapper
        Returns the possibly-null TrackDataPair resembling the selected track of the playlist this object wraps.

        Note: This may return null if this object does NOT wrap a playlist or if the used AudioNode is running Lavalink Server v2.

        Specified by:
        getSelectedTrack in interface AudioWrapper
        Returns:
        The possibly-null TrackDataPair with the information of the selected track.

      • getLoadedTracks

        @Nonnull
public java.util.List<TrackDataPair> getLoadedTracks()
        Description copied from interface: AudioWrapper
        Returns an unmodifiable, NOT-null list containing all the TrackDataPairs.

        The TrackDataPair class just contains the AudioTrack itself and its encoded data.
        Additionally, if no tracks were returned (errors, no matches, empty, etc.) then an empty list will be returned, NOT a null one.

        Specified by:
        getLoadedTracks in interface AudioWrapper
        Returns:
        An not-null unmodifiable list containing all the TrackDataPairs.

      • getPlaylistName

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getPlaylistName()
        Description copied from interface: AudioWrapper
        Returns the possibly-null name of the playlist this object wraps.

        Note: This may return null if this object does NOT wrap a playlist or if the used AudioNode is running Lavalink Server v2.

        Specified by:
        getPlaylistName in interface AudioWrapper
        Returns:
        The possibly-null name of the playlist this object represents.
